  • Method Details

    • addDelivery

      public void addDelivery​(Delivery delivery) throws TruckersException
      Adds a new delivery into the repository.
      Parameters:
      delivery - to add.
      Throws:
      TruckersException - if there is already a delivery with the same id.

    • getAllDeliveries

      public java.util.List<Delivery> getAllDeliveries()
      Returns all deliveries.
      Returns:
      a List consisting of all deliveries.

    • updateDelivery

      public void updateDelivery​(Delivery updatedDelivery)
      Updates the given delivery based on the provided id.
      Parameters:
      updatedDelivery - represents the new data for the delivery with the specified id.
      Throws:
      TruckersException - if there is no delivery with the given id.

    • getDeliveriesByOriginAndDestination

      public java.util.List<Delivery> getDeliveriesByOriginAndDestination​(java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String destination)
      Returns a filtered List representing the deliveries for which the provided origin and destination are substrings of the delivery's origin and destination.
      Parameters:
      origin - that the delivery should contain.
      destination - that the delivery should contain.
      Returns:
      a List consisting of the filtered deliveries.

    • deleteDelivery

      public void deleteDelivery​(int byId)
      Deletes a Delivery entity based on the given id.
      Parameters:
      byId - the id by which the delivery will be deleted.
      Throws:
      TruckersException - if no entity was deleted.
